Name: Rum & IT
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Fragata Green Olives .
Review: Created in April 2017 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
History: I mixed these two ingredients together just to ascertain where to go from there when creating a drink with Italicus. Then do I add a dash of maraschino, curaçao or bitters? I tried numerous liqueurs and bitters but I like the simplicity of this two ingredient cocktail. Now try it with gin – yup, Gin & It also works well. Later, the same mixing session also gave birth to For Sake's Sake.
